languages.text: На капитанский мостик поступили тревожные вокс-сообщения от мастера припасов: часть провианта и питьевой воды протухла и продолжает портиться, наполняясь жирными серыми червями. Однако запах гнили так и не отравил корабельный воздух, и порой черви полностью исчезают из вида. Стоит ли избавляться от оскверненных продуктов?

traits.locale_text: На капитанский мостик поступили тревожные вокс-сообщения от мастера припасов: часть провианта и питьевой воды протухла и продолжает портиться, наполняясь жирными серыми червями. Однако запах гнили так и не отравил корабельный воздух, и порой черви полностью исчезают из вида. Стоит ли избавляться от оскверненных продуктов?

languages.text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?
languages.original_text: На капитанский мостик поступили тревожные вокс-сообщения от мастера припасов: часть провианта и питьевой воды протухла и продолжает портиться, наполняясь жирными серыми червями. Однако запах гнили так и не отравил корабельный воздух, и порой черви полностью исчезают из вида. Стоит ли избавляться от оскверненных продуктов?

traits.locale_text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water went bad and keeps getting worse, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains blissfully free of the rank odour and the maggots sometimes vanish out of sight. Should he get rid of the affected victuals?

The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water went bad and keeps getting worse, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains blissfully free of the rank odour and the maggots sometimes vanish out of sight. Should he get rid of the affected victuals?

The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

languages.text: 舰桥收到了军需官发来的音阵信息，内容令人不安：一部分粮食与饮用水都已经发生变质，情况还在继续恶化，到处都爬满了肥大的灰色蛆虫。然而，船上的空气并没有被腐烂的臭气污染，蛆虫有时会完全从视线中消失。我们应该把受影响的食物处理掉吗？
languages.original_text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

traits.locale_text: 舰桥收到了军需官发来的音阵信息，内容令人不安：一部分粮食与饮用水都已经发生变质，情况还在继续恶化，到处都爬满了肥大的灰色蛆虫。然而，船上的空气并没有被腐烂的臭气污染，蛆虫有时会完全从视线中消失。我们应该把受影响的食物处理掉吗？

languages.text: El puente de mando recibe un mensaje voco alarmante del intendente: algunas provisiones y el agua potable se han echado a perder y siguen empeorando, repletas de gusanos grises y gordos. Sin embargo, el aire de la nave permanece impoluto y los gusanos a veces desaparecen por completo. ¿Deberíamos deshacernos de los suministros afectados?
languages.original_text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

traits.locale_text: El puente de mando recibe un mensaje voco alarmante del intendente: algunas provisiones y el agua potable se han echado a perder y siguen empeorando, repletas de gusanos grises y gordos. Sin embargo, el aire de la nave permanece impoluto y los gusanos a veces desaparecen por completo. ¿Deberíamos deshacernos de los suministros afectados?

languages.text: 司令ブリッジは、補給係から驚くべきヴォクスメッセージを受け取った。いくつかの食料と飲料水が悪くなって、悪化の一途を辿り、ブクブクした灰色のウジ虫であふれていると言う。しかし、船の空気は悪臭で汚れのない状態で、ウジ虫は時々視界から綺麗さっぱり消えると言うのだ。被害に遭った貯蔵品を処分するべきだろうか？
languages.original_text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

traits.locale_text: 司令ブリッジは、補給係から驚くべきヴォクスメッセージを受け取った。いくつかの食料と飲料水が悪くなって、悪化の一途を辿り、ブクブクした灰色のウジ虫であふれていると言う。しかし、船の空気は悪臭で汚れのない状態で、ウジ虫は時々視界から綺麗さっぱり消えると言うのだ。被害に遭った貯蔵品を処分するべきだろうか？

languages.text: Le commandement reçoit une communication-vox inquiétante du quartier-maître : certaines provisions ainsi qu'une partie de l'eau potable se sont gâtées, et la situation continue d'empirer, les réserves grouillant désormais de grosses larves grises. Étonnamment, l'air du navire n'est pas souillé par l'odeur nauséabonde et il arrive que les larves ne soient plus du tout visibles. Peut-être vaut-il mieux se débarrasser des réserves contaminées ?
languages.original_text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

traits.locale_text: Le commandement reçoit une communication-vox inquiétante du quartier-maître : certaines provisions ainsi qu'une partie de l'eau potable se sont gâtées, et la situation continue d'empirer, les réserves grouillant désormais de grosses larves grises. Étonnamment, l'air du navire n'est pas souillé par l'odeur nauséabonde et il arrive que les larves ne soient plus du tout visibles. Peut-être vaut-il mieux se débarrasser des réserves contaminées ?

languages.text: Die Kommandobrücke hat eine alarmierende Voxnachricht vom Quartiermeister empfangen: Ein Teil der Vorräte und des Trinkwassers sind schlecht geworden, es wuseln fette graue Maden darin. Die Luft auf dem Schiff ist jedoch frei von jedem Gestank, und die Maden verschwinden manchmal vollständig und nichts ist mehr zu sehen. Sollen wir die betroffenen Vorräte entsorgen?
languages.original_text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?

traits.locale_text: Die Kommandobrücke hat eine alarmierende Voxnachricht vom Quartiermeister empfangen: Ein Teil der Vorräte und des Trinkwassers sind schlecht geworden, es wuseln fette graue Maden darin. Die Luft auf dem Schiff ist jedoch frei von jedem Gestank, und die Maden verschwinden manchmal vollständig und nichts ist mehr zu sehen. Sollen wir die betroffenen Vorräte entsorgen?

languages.text: Komuta köprüsü, levazım subayından endişe verici bir voks mesajı aldı. Gemideki bazı erzaklar ve içme suyu bozulmuş; içlerinde kalın, gri kurtçuklar peyda olmuş durum daha da kötüye gidiyormuş. Ancak geminin havasında bir farklılık yok ve kurtçuklar, bazen tamamen gözden kayboluyor. Bozulmuş erzakları atmalı mıyız?
languages.original_text: The command bridge received an alarming vox-message from the quartermaster: some of the provisions and drinking water have gone bad and continue to worsen, teeming with fat grey maggots. However, the ship's air remains undefiled by the rank odour, and the maggots sometimes completely vanish from sight. Should we get rid of the affected stores?
